name: chat-system
description: High-performance chat system with Node.js and Next.js 15

scripts.db:migrate: pnpm run env:init && cd packages/database && pnpm prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:generate: pnpm run env:init && cd packages/database && pnpm prisma generate
scripts.db:studio: pnpm run env:init && cd packages/database && pnpm prisma studio
scripts.load-test:all: npm run load-test:http && npm run load-test:ws
